#summary USB AVR Development Board for the ATmega32U4

This board is still under development.

The relevant [http://www.lis.inpg.fr/realise_au_lis/kicad/ KiCAD] design files can be found in ~~the latest [http://code.google.com/p/micropendous/downloads/list Micropendous Distribution] or via~~ [http://code.google.com/p/micropendous/source/checkout SVN] in the `/Micropendous/Design/Micropendous-32U4` directory.

A PCB of this design can be purchased at cost through [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44233 BatchPCB].
